original_text: In that day new wine will run from the mountains. And milk will run from the hills. All the valleys of Judah will have rivers of water. Water will come from the house of the Lord and it will water the Valley of Acacias. In that day new wine will run from the mountains. And milk will run from the hills. All the valleys of Judah will have rivers of water. Water will come from the house of the Lord and it will water the Valley of Acacias. In that day new wine will run from the mountains.
korean_text: 그 날에 산들이 단 포도주를 떨어뜨릴 것이며 작은 산들이 젖을 흘릴 것이며 유다 모든 시내가 물을 흘릴 것이며 여호와의 성전에서 샘이 흘러 나와서 싯딤 골짜기에 대리라

sentences.original_text: new wine will run from the mountains
And milk will run from the hills
Water will come from the house of the Lord
and it will water the Valley of Acacias
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 물이 아카시아 골짜기를 물대겠습니다

and it will water the Valley of Acacias
